CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1946, pg. 21, reads: "For the Cause - In an effort to raise funds for a scholarship for a worthy recipient, the National Association of Colored Graduate Nurses will sponsor a cabaret ball at the Northside Elks Rest on Friday, June 21.  Seated left to right: Elizabeth James, Christine Williams, Ruth Oden, Pauline Hord and Frances Patterson.  Standing left to right: Lillian Lesesne, Ruth Gadson, Dorothy Young, Helen Clark, Anna King, Jane Williams, Doris Thomas and Margaret Dorsett. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of National Association of Colored Graduate Nurses seated from left: Elizabeth James, Christine Williams, Ruth Oden, Pauline Hord, Frances Patterson; standing: Lillian Lesesne, Ruth Gadson, Dorothy Young, Helen Clark, Anna King, Jane Williams, Doris Thomas, and Margaret Dorsett, posed in Loendi Club
